```{r}
source("functions/timbRecovery.R")

timeLength = 500
logIntensity = 10
logCycle = 60
omega0 = 0.80
longitude = c(-70, -52) 
latitude = c(0, -5)
dti = 0.10

recov = timbRecovery(timeLength, logIntensity, logCycle, omega0, longitude, latitude, dti)

plot(recov[[1]], type = "l", ylab = "Timber volume (m3/ha)", xlab = "Time (yr)")
lines(recov[[2]], lty=2, ylab = "Timber volume (m3/ha)", xlab = "Time (yr)")

```
